welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Greenbelt, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and vibrant community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all the wonderful things this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights at Tipton AAF Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport, which houses the majority of the airport's facilities.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'DCA Free WiFi' from their device's list of available networks.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at BWI airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at BWI airport is mainly used for domestic flights operated by Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at BWI airport serves domestic flights operated by various airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at BWI airport serves both domestic and international flights operated by various airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at BWI airport serves domestic and international flights operated by various airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lee Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport is primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport is primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
